thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com
thread.title: Dennis K
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Dennis K

author: Dennis K
title: Dennis K
text: Each box contained exactly what was needed to prepare a tasty, nutritional meal. No waste involved with the ingredients. Recipe instructions were simple, easy to understand. Ingredients were there as needed. Small spice containers, squeeze tubes for sour cream, just the right amount of vegetables--everything was simple and easy to prepare. We were happy with our excellent meals in a box. Protein was just perfect to get two filling servings.
